code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='https://your-backend-app-name.herokuapp.com/api';export const signup=userData=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/signup"),userData);export const login=userData=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/login"),userData);export const getProfile=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/profile"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export const updateProfile=userData=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/profile"),userData,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export const addActivityHistory=activity=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');return axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/activities"),{activity},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
